adDetails: GRANDMOTHER, STANFORD RETIREE, PROFESSIONAL SITTER, (THE CAT'S MEOW) WISHES TO RETURN TO CALIFORNIA TO VISIT FAMILY. BONDED, HAVE TRAVELED THE WORLD PET/HOUSESITTING. STERLING REFERENCES. LOVE ANIMALS - WILL TREAT YOUR HOME WITH RESPECT. OPEN TO DATES AND LOCATION. PREFER NO LARGE DOGS. THANKS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION.
